alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central El Paso County; Western El Paso County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 28 at 5:28PM CDT until March 29 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...For the Dona Ana, parts of the Sierra, Otero and El Paso counties. * WHEN...From noon to 9 PM MDT Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will create hazardous driving conditions, especially for high profile vehicle. Loose outdoor objects will be blown around and blowing dust may also become an issue which can reduce visibilities
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern, Central El Paso County; Western El Paso County
